alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 01 at 7:13AM CST until January 02 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph expected. * WHERE...In Alabama, Baldwin Central, Mobile Central, Baldwin Coastal and Mobile Coastal Counties. In Florida, Santa Rosa Coastal, Okaloosa Coastal and Escambia Coastal Counties. * WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal
